prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon with dark wings and a fierce expression.
I want a mythical bird Pokemon that embodies destruction and chaos.
Generate a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a giant raven with menacing features.
Make a Pokemon with striking red and black colors, showcasing its powerful aura.
Imagine a winged creature with a unique silhouette, representing the balance between life and death.
Design a Pokemon that looks like it could control shadows and instill fear in its opponents.
Give me a Pokemon that is both majestic and intimidating, with an emphasis on its dark abilities.
